### **Importing and preparing the Data Set**

#### **loading packages**

Load the required packages.

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, DT, patchwork, plotly)
```

Load the Data Set

```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```

###  Visualise with plot_ly

```{r}
plot_ly(data = exam_data, 
        x = ~ENGLISH, 
        y = ~MATHS, 
        color = ~RACE)
```
